summary.span: 根據 Alpha、紅、綠、藍色板描述色彩。

span.span: Describes a color in terms of alpha, red, green, and blue channels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public byte A { get; set; }
.property instance unsigned int8 A
Public Property A As Byte
public: property System::Byte A { System::Byte get(); void set(System::Byte value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定色彩的 Alpha 色頻值。

span.span: Gets or sets the alpha channel value of the color.

value.span: 色彩的 Alpha 色板值，這是介於 0 到 255 之間的值。

span.span: The alpha channel value of the color, a value between 0 and 255.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Alpha 色板結構決定的透明度有。The alpha channel of a structure determines the amount of transparency the has. 255 的 alpha 值表示完全不透明，0 的值表示的色彩就是完全透明。An alpha value of 255 indicates the is completely opaque and a value of 0 indicates the color is completely transparent. `sRGB`通道 (， ， ， ) 和 ScRGB 通道 (， ， ， ) 的結構會同步處理屬性。The `sRGB` channels (, , , ) and the ScRGB channels (, , , ) of the structure are synchronized properties. 例如，當、 `sRGB` alpha 色板，已經過修改， `ScRGB` alpha 色板， ，轉換為對等項目使用 0-1 的值範圍內，`Sc`配置支援。For example, when , the `sRGB` alpha channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` alpha channel, , is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Media.Color Add (System.Windows.Media.Color color1, System.Windows.Media.Color color2);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Windows.Media.Color Add(valuetype System.Windows.Media.Color color1, valuetype System.Windows.Media.Color color2) cil managed
Public Shared Function Add (color1 As Color, color2 As Color) As Color
public: static System::Windows::Media::Color Add(System::Windows::Media::Color color1, System::Windows::Media::Color color2);

param.name: color1
param.span: 要加的第一個 結構。

span.span: The first structure to add.

param.name: color2
param.span: 要加的第二個 結構。

span.span: The second structure to add.

summary.span: 將兩個 結構相加。

span.span: Adds two structures.

returns.span: 新的 結構，這個結構的色彩值是加法運算的結果。

span.span: A new structure whose color values are the results of the addition operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構會加在一起，方法是加入第二個色彩的 alpha、 紅色、 綠色和藍色通道的第一個色彩的 alpha、 紅色、 綠色和藍色通道。 structures are added together by adding the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the first color to the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the second color. 比方說的 alpha 色板`color1`和的 alpha 色板`color2`會加入在一起，以產生結果色彩的 alpha 色板。For example, the alpha channel of `color1` and the alpha channel of `color2` are added together to produce the alpha channel of the resulting color. 相同的紅色、 綠色和藍色的通道，以產生新的色彩的紅色、 綠色和藍色通道使用完成。The same is done with the red, green, and blue channels to produce the red, green, and blue channels of the new color.

param.span: 要比較的第一個色彩。

param.span: 要比較的第二個色彩。

returns.span: 如果 與 幾乎相等，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if and are nearly identical; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個相等方法補償浮點數的值可以取得少量的錯誤時在其上作業的事實。This equality method compensates for the fact that floating-point values can acquire a small amount of error when operated upon.

span.span: The blue channel value of the structure, a value between 0 and 255.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `sRGB`通道 (， ， ， ) 和`ScRGB`通道 (， ， ， ) 的結構已同步處理的屬性。The `sRGB` channels (, , , ) and the `ScRGB` channels (, , , ) of the structure are synchronized properties. 例如，當、`sRGB`藍色通道，在修改，`ScRGB`藍色色板， ，轉換為對等項目使用 0-1 的值範圍內，`Sc`配置支援。For example, when , the `sRGB` blue channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` blue channel, , is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.

summary.span: 如果色彩的 色板超出 0 到 1 的色域圖範圍，則將它設定在該範圍內。

span.span: Sets the channels of the color to within the gamut of 0 to 1, if they are outside that range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一系列`ScRGB`色彩空間大於限制範圍，所以使用這個方法可能會導致遺失色彩資訊。The gamut of the `ScRGB` color space is larger than the clamp range, so the use of this method may result in the loss of color information.

Public ReadOnly Property ColorContext As ColorContext

summary.span: 取得色彩的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] 或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] 色彩設定檔。

span.span: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile of the color.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile of the color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)]色彩設定檔包含特定應用程式或裝置色彩印表機的色彩系統設定檔。A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile contains a color system profile for a particular application or device such as a color printer. 此設定檔會對應至通用的設定檔，後者可以對應至個別的設定檔的其他裝置。This profile is matched to a common profile that in turn can be mapped to the individual profiles of other devices. 這可讓一部電腦的裝置用來比對從其他應用程式和裝置在相同或其他電腦系統上的色彩的色彩系統。This allows the color system used by one computer device to match the colors from other applications and devices on the same or other computer systems.

summary.span: 測試兩個 結構是否一致。

span.span: Tests whether two structures are identical.

param.span: 與這個 結構相比較的物件。

span.span: The object to compare to this structure.

summary.span: 測試指定的物件是否為 結構且相當於這個色彩。

span.span: Tests whether the specified object is a structure and is equivalent to this color.

returns.span: 如果指定的物件為 結構，而且和目前的 結構相等則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the specified object is a structure and is identical to the current structure; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它們會在其上作業時，浮點數值可以取得程度輕微的錯誤。Floating-point values can acquire a small degree of error when they are operated upon. 方法，運算子，而運算子無法補救此不，因此可能不會傳回預期的布林結果。The method, the operator, and the operator do not compensate for this and thus may not return the expected Boolean result. 方法會使用模糊的等號比較演算法藉由傳回浮點算術錯誤補償`true`的兩個比較結構幾乎相同，但其值可能不同minuscule 數量。The method uses a fuzzy equality algorithm that compensates for this floating-point arithmetic error by returning `true` for a comparison of two structures that are practically identical, but whose values may differ by a minuscule amount.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它們會在其上作業時，浮點數值可以取得程度輕微的錯誤。Floating-point values can acquire a small degree of error when they are operated upon. 方法，運算子，而運算子無法補救此不，因此可能不會傳回預期的布林結果。The method, the operator, and the operator do not compensate for this and thus may not return the expected Boolean result. 方法會使用模糊的等號比較演算法藉由傳回浮點算術錯誤補償`true`的兩個比較結構幾乎相同，但其值可能不同minuscule 數量。The method uses a fuzzy equality algorithm that compensates for this floating-point arithmetic error by returning `true` for a comparison of two structures that are practically identical, but whose values may differ by a minuscule amount.

Alpha 值為 1 表示完全不透明的色彩就是，和值為 0 表示的色彩是完全透明。An alpha value of 1 indicates that the color is completely opaque, and a value of 0 indicates that the color is completely transparent. SRGB 通道 (， ， ， ) 和 ScRGB 通道 (， ， ， ) 的結構會同步處理內容。The sRGB channels (, , , ) and the ScRGB channels (, , , ) of the structure are synchronized properties. 例如，當，紅色 sRGB 通道已修改 ScRGB 紅色通道， ，轉換為相等的值。For example, when , the sRGB red channel, is modified the ScRGB red channel, , is transformed to the equivalent value. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來建立結構。The following example shows how to use the method to create a structure. remarks.format: ## Remarks A[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)]色彩設定檔包含特定應用程式或裝置色彩印表機的色彩系統設定檔。A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile contains a color system profile for a particular application or device such as a color printer. 此設定檔會對應至通用的設定檔，後者可以對應至個別的設定檔的其他裝置。This profile is matched to a common profile that in turn can be mapped to the individual profiles of other devices. 這可讓一部電腦的裝置用來比對從其他應用程式和裝置在相同或其他電腦系統上的色彩的色彩系統。This allows the color system used by one computer device to match the colors from other applications and devices on the same or other computer systems. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來建立結構。The following example shows how to use the method to create a structure. [!code-csharp[BrushesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#FromValuesExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BrushesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/CreateColorsFromExample.cs#fromvaluesexample)] [!code-vb[BrushesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#FromValuesExample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BrushesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/createcolorsfromexample.vb#fromvaluesexample)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `sRGB`通道 (， ， ， ) 和`ScRGB`通道 (， ， ， ) 的結構已同步處理的屬性。The `sRGB` channels (, , , ) and the `ScRGB` channels (, , , ) of the structure are synchronized properties. 例如，當、`sRGB`綠色通道，在修改，`ScRGB`綠色色板， ，轉換為對等項目使用 0-1 的值範圍內，`Sc`配置支援。For example, when , the `sRGB` green channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` green channel, , is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構會加在一起，方法是加入第二個色彩的 alpha、 紅色、 綠色和藍色通道的第一個色彩的 alpha、 紅色、 綠色和藍色通道。 structures are added together by adding the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the first color to the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the second color. 比方說的 alpha 色板`color1`和的 alpha 色板`color2`會加入在一起，以產生結果色彩的 alpha 色板。For example, the alpha channel of `color1` and the alpha channel of `color2` are added together to produce the alpha channel of the resulting color. 相同的紅色、 綠色和藍色的通道，以產生新的色彩的紅色、 綠色和藍色通道使用完成。The same is done with the red, green, and blue channels to produce the red, green, and blue channels of the new color. 這個運算子的對等方法是 The equivalent method for this operator is

span.span: if and are exactly identical; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它們會在其上作業時，浮點數值可以取得程度輕微的錯誤。Floating-point values can acquire a small degree of error when they are operated upon. 方法，運算子，而運算子無法補救此不，因此可能不會傳回預期的布林結果。The method, the operator, and the operator do not compensate for this and thus may not return the expected Boolean result. 方法會使用模糊的等號比較演算法藉由傳回浮點算術錯誤補償`true`的兩個比較結構幾乎相同，但其值可能不同minuscule 數量。The method uses a fuzzy equality algorithm that compensates for this floating-point arithmetic error by returning `true` for a comparison of two structures that are practically identical, but whose values may differ by a minuscule amount. 這個運算子的對等方法是 The equivalent method for this operator is

remarks.format: ## Remarks `sRGB`通道 (， ， ， ) 和`ScRGB`通道 (， ， ， ) 的結構已同步處理的屬性。The `sRGB` channels (, , , ) and the `ScRGB` channels (, , , ) of the structure are synchronized properties. 例如，當、`sRGB`紅色色板，已經過修改，`ScRGB`紅色色板， ，轉換為對等項目使用 0-1 的值範圍內，`Sc`配置支援。For example, when , the `sRGB` red channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` red channel, , is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.

summary.span: 取得或設定色彩的 Alpha 色頻值。

value.span: 結構的 Alpha 色板值，這是介於 0 到 1 之間的值。

span.span: The alpha channel value of the structure, a value between 0 and 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Alpha 色板結構決定的透明度有。The alpha channel of a structure determines the amount of transparency the has. Alpha 值 1 表示完全不透明，0 的值表示的色彩就是完全透明。An alpha value of 1 indicates the is completely opaque and a value of 0 indicates the color is completely transparent. `sRGB`通道 (， ， ， ) 和`ScRGB`通道 (， ， ， ) 的結構已同步處理的屬性。The `sRGB` channels (, , , ) and the `ScRGB` channels (, , , ) of the structure are synchronized properties. 例如，當、 `sRGB` alpha 色板，已經過修改， `ScRGB` alpha 色板，轉換為對等項目使用 0-1 的值範圍內，`Sc`配置支援。For example, when , the `sRGB` alpha channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` alpha channel, is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
